West_Jordan.Daybreak Parkway (UTA station):
Daybreak Parkway is a light rail station in the Daybreak Community in West Jordan, Utah, in the United States, served by the Red Line of the Utah Transit Authority's (UTA) TRAX light rail system. The station is the southwestern terminus of the Red Line, which provides service from this station to the University of Utah.


== Description ==
The station is located at 11405 South Grandville Avenue (about 5150 West) with both of the station's side platforms situated in the median of that road.
